word:
During His ministry, Jesus raised the dead to life. He raised the son of the widow of Nain, the daughter of Jairus, and Lazarus; but these were not clothed with immortality. After they were raised, they continued to be subject to death. But those who came forth from the grave at Christ's resurrection were raised to everlasting 
                                                                           305
life. They were the multitude of captives that ascended with Him as trophies of His victory over death and the grave.
